price: Kandi iyo ubabajije uti “Ni nde waremye ibirere n’isi?” Rwose baravuga bati “Byaremwe n’Umunyacyubahiro bihebuje, Umumenyi uhebuje (Allah).”
arabic: وَلَئِن سَأَلۡتَهُم مَّنۡ خَلَقَ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضَ لَيَقُولُنَّ خَلَقَهُنَّ ٱلۡعَزِيزُ ٱلۡعَلِيمُ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: wala-in sa-altahum man khalaqa al-samāwāti wal-arḍa layaqūlunna khalaqahunna al-ʿazīzu al-ʿalīmu
